welcome_message_body: "Welcome to the charming and scenic Lake Barcroft! Known for its breathtaking views and charming community, we invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer. Have a wonderful stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: Serves domestic flights for American Airlines, Delta, and United.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: Serves domestic flights for Alaska Airlines, JetBlue, and Southwest.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: Serves domestic and international flights for Air Canada, Frontier, and Sun Country.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Potomac Airfield Airport handles all commercial flights and services.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Potomac Airfield Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Washington Dulles International Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A at Washington Dulles International Airport serves domestic and international flights, with a focus on United Airlines.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at Washington Dulles International Airport serves domestic and international flights, with a focus on American Airlines.

terminals.name: Concourse C
terminals.description: Concourse C at Washington Dulles International Airport serves domestic and international flights, with a focus on Delta Airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Montgomery County Airport offers a variety of amenities for travelers, including dining options and rental car services.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Tipton AAF Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
